Title: Relates to access to appropriate drugs at reasonable prices, formulary exceptions, standing prior authorizations and external appeals
Summary: Relates to access to appropriate drugs at reasonable prices, formulary exceptions, standing prior authorizations and external appeals; to access to retail pharmacies, prescription synchronization, limits on patient drug costs, explanations of benefits and rebates; to prescription drug synchronization; to pharmacy benefit management; and to limits on copayments and drug substitutions.
LawCode: Amd Ins L, generally; add §4406-j, amd §§4903, 4910 & 4914, Pub Health L; amd §§367-a & 364-j, Soc Serv L; amd §§6810 & 6826-a, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law and the public health law, in relation to access to appropriate drugs at reasonable prices, formulary exceptions, standing prior authorizations and external appeals; to amend the insurance law, in relation to access to retail pharmacies, prescription synchronization, limits on patient drug costs, explanations of benefits and rebates; to amend the social services law, in relation to prescription drug synchronization; and to amend the education law, in relation to limits on copayments and drug substitutions
